snippet: Given the close presidential race, equities moved marginally higher and lower in quiet, uncommitted dealings.
abstract: Stocks post slight gains in light trading ahead of presidential election.
lead_paragraph: Given the close presidential race, equities moved marginally higher and lower in quiet, uncommitted dealings.

headline.main: As Decision Day Looms, Trading Seems Indecisive
headline.print_headline: As Decision Day Looms, Trading Seems Indecisive
